name: Oscilla
description: Oscilla is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is a proud member of the WebtrES club. With its vibrant orange box and cat-shaped buttons, Oscilla brings a touch of whimsy to the world of technology. Its arms and legs are designed in a hand-down configuration, allowing it to interact with its surroundings with ease. The screen on its front is equipped with a powerful laser, enabling Oscilla to analyze and visualize electrical signals with precision and accuracy. Oscilla possesses a unique blend of charm, intelligence, and dexterity, making it an invaluable asset to the WebtrES club and a trusted companion in the digital realm.
